job_history.work_description: Highly involved in the oversight and operations of Local 2534's Union office. Prepare and conduct training to other Locals. Oversee a board and steward structure of 12 members as well as indirect supervisor of 3 trustees of our local.

Provided operational support to the Section Aviation Manager and provided technical assistance to field aviators. Plan, direct, coordinated and control all aspects of public or private airports/heliports to be sure they complied with state regulations ensuring safety procedures.

Supported the Policy and Planning Division with accounting and administrative duties within the grants and revolving loan program. Process time sensitive grant amendments received from airport sponsors/owners.
Assist with the day to day operations of the inspection sticker counter. Perform implementation of stickers and enforce compliance with regulations.
Assist with day to day operations of the Temporary Plates counter. Perform implementation of temporary tags and enforce compliance with regulations.

Assist with day to day operations for the operations of Department of Transportation's Riverside Office Center (ROC) mailroom. Coordinated different types of mailing machines in ensure proper distribution.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in leadership roles, including being the AFSCME Union President, overseeing a board and steward structure, and providing training to other Locals, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing and coordinating various projects, including planning, directing, and controlling aspects of public or private airports/heliports, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Operational Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing day-to-day operations in various roles, including overseeing the Union office, providing operational support, and coordinating grants and revolving loan programs, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing time-sensitive tasks, including processing grant amendments and coordinating mailroom operations, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Compliance Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in enforcing compliance with regulations in various roles, including airport safety procedures and vehicle registration, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience in providing technical assistance, conducting training, and coordinating with various stakeholders, showing a solid working proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Computer Science
skills.explanation: Has a graduate degree in Computer Science, but there is limited information on practical experience, indicating some familiarity with the subject.

skills.name: Labor Studies
skills.explanation: Has a graduate degree in Labor Studies, but there is limited information on practical experience, indicating some familiarity with the subject.
